Posts.Content: Feb 6, 2008 07:53PM ccheeseman wrote: I was diagnosed with DCIS grade 2, non invasive, 2cm.  Lumpectomy - margins were not clear, re-excision - margins still not clear - then multifocal was diagnosed.  Finally a mastectomy and they found another area of 2.3 cm remaining - this after 2 lumpectomies.  Glad I had the mastectomy in the long run - wish I'd done it initially - but hindsight is 20/20.    There is no clear cut way to know.  Trust your instincts!
Posts.Title: Multifocal DCIS Mastectomy or no? ShayRN HelenaJ
